content.html: My long-suffering spouse was putting the kids in bed when I interrupted, "I need help, something's smoking in the bathroom!" He rushed in, followed by the kidsâ€”who were confused to find me crying w/ laughter. The kids neither knew what "smoking" meant nor why we were laughing ðŸ˜‚

My long-suffering spouse was putting the kids in bed when I interrupted, "I need help, something's smoking in the bathroom!"

He rushed in, followed by the kidsâ€”who were confused to find me crying w/ laughter. The kids neither knew what "smoking" meant nor why we were laughing ðŸ˜‚

photo.alt: A photo of a toilet with two toilet paper rolls atop it that look like eyes, with an empty toilet paper tube inside the lid that looks vaguely like a cigarette.
